message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE. 

The paper deals with the problem of ensuring correctness of transactional applications running on top of distributed, replicated systems with weak consistency models. This problem is closely related to database systems (cs.DB) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also uses formal methods and logic to reason about program correctness, which falls under programming languages (cs.PL) and logic in computer science (cs.LO). Finally, the paper proposes a fully automated approach for detecting serializability violations, which involves software engineering techniques (cs.SE).
